title: Desk Cable Clip
summary: Adhesive-friendly clip with circular channel and press-fit opening for routing cables.

parameters.clip_width: Overall printable width of the clip body.
parameters.clip_depth: Distance from wall to opening; controls adhesive pad size.
parameters.clip_height: Height of the clip including mounting pad.
parameters.gap_width: Width of the squeeze gap for inserting the cable.
parameters.base_thickness: Thickness of the adhesive pad backing.

notes: Combination of cylinder subtraction and chamfered slot illustrates constructive solid geometry usage.
